name: Mac and Cheese
description: Deluge your tongue in the sensuous creamy river of cheese and noodles.
instructions: 1. Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat.
2. Stir in corn starch, salt, and pepper until smooth.
3. Slowly pour in buttermilk and milk, stirring constantly.
4. Bring to a boil and cook for 2 minutes, stirring constantly.
5. Reduce heat to low and add cheese.
7. Cook macaroni according to package directions.
8. Drain and stir into cheese sauce.
